description: Throughout my career as a programmer, I have worked on numerous personal and professional projects. I believe it is essential for a programmer to always have personal projects to engage with, as the knowledge gained from one can often be adapted and applied to another.

Behind each card, you will find information about my roles and the most relevant aspects of each project. You will also have access to GitHub links to explore the code, direct links to the product, details about the technologies used, and my role in the development.

projects.name: Fitness Hub
projects.description: Track water intake, steps, weight, and supplements. Free, ad-free, and 100% offline. Make fitness an easy and accessible habit!

projects.name: Pedometer
projects.description: Fitness Hub-related. Custom Capacitor plugin for step counting (Android only).

projects.name: Mi Codere
projects.description: Join, increase your bets, and earn points to redeem for fantastic rewards. If available in your region, you can also close bets early and manage all your tickets from the app.

projects.name: Codere LATAM
projects.description: In Club Codere, you'll find information about events, promotions, venue locations, and more. Check your points and redeem them.

projects.name: Push Agent
projects.description: Push notification agent featuring an integrated server, a database, and a system to send push notifications completely free of charge.

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: My personal website: a space where I showcase all my projects, generate resumes, and share my personal blog.

projects.name: Youtube2ivooX
projects.description: This project focuses on automating the process of converting and uploading YouTube content to the iVoox podcast platform using Python and Selenium.

projects.name: LTA+
projects.description: Developed an aerospace calculation application for military operations from scratch, leading the team and managing technical challenges like custom plugins, automation scripts, and file security.

projects.name: EFB ZIP
projects.description: LTA+ related. Zip/Unzip file support. Electron and iOS compatible.

projects.name: EFB Filesystem
projects.description: LTA+ related. Fork of the official Ionic Filesystem plugin. Electron support added. The Filesystem API provides a NodeJS-like API for working with files on the device. Fully supported.

projects.name: EFB SFTP
projects.description: LTA+ related. Native SFTP protocol integration. Supports Electron and iOS only.

projects.name: EFB E2E Testsuit
projects.description: LTA+ related. End-to-end testing tool for LTA+ iOS systems. Built with Appium, Jasmine, and WebDriverIO.

projects.name: Demiurge
projects.description: The word 'demiurge' comes from the Greek 'dēmiourgós,' meaning 'maker,' 'craftsman,' 'producer,' and ultimately 'creator.'

projects.name: Blazebooks
projects.description: Immerse yourself in interactive stories where every choice impacts the plot and character behavior.

projects.name: Blaze Server
projects.description: NodeJS/NestJS server for Blazebooks: user management, file handling, and database management.

projects.name: Rainclouds Web
projects.description: Website for the Atmospheric Black Metal band RAZAK, which was live for several years.

projects.name: P4RZ1V4L
projects.description: Experimental console-based environment for testing trading bots, featuring genetic algorithms and backtesting for optimizing investment strategies.

projects.name: L4NC3L0T
projects.description: Automated trading bot built in Python, designed to execute investment strategies autonomously.

projects.name: Retro Games
projects.description: Retro arcade game app developed with Ionic and Phaser, offering a collection of classic games optimized for mobile devices.

projects.name: Stoic Manager
projects.description: Personal management app inspired by Stoic principles, helping users organize their daily tasks.

projects.name: Blazebooks (old)
projects.description: Speed reading platform offering a variety of literary genres, technical readings, and interactive books, accompanied by music and personalized recommendations.
